response.overview: A nostalgic short documentary capturing heartfelt memories of people recalling their very first experience watching a film in a theatre. Each voice shares a personal story of wonder, excitement, and the timeless magic of cinema.
response.tagline: A nostalgic short documentary capturing heartfelt memories of people recalling their very first experience watching a film in a theatre. Each voice shares a personal story of wonder, excitement, and the timeless magic of cinema.
response.title: Once Upon a Silver Screen
